name: AlaeApplication
title: ALAE Application
description: How allocated loss adjustment expenses (ALAE) interact with the deductible or retention.

concept.definition: ALAE is handled separately and does not erode or count against the deductible amount.
ALAE counts against and erodes the deductible — the insured's total obligation includes both loss and adjustment expenses.
ALAE does not erode the deductible — the carrier covers adjustment expenses on top of the insured's deductible obligation.
